m_szDocSumamry: Electric Hybrid Trucks & SUVs from Via Motors Could Be a Game Changer August 15th, 2012 by Adam Johnston     Don’t look now, but it looks like the evolution of electric automobiles may finally be turning towards trucks and sports utility vehicles (SUVs) thanks to Via Motors. Recently, I watched a video featuring Jay Leno’ s Garage. In the 12-minute video, Leno discusses what “more or less is a truck version of the Chevy Volt,” called VTrux.
